title: Incompatibility with Tensor and Variable cuda `device_id`
body_html:
As mentioned in https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/copying-a-variable-to-a-different-gpu/7237, there is a discrepancy between tensor.cuda(device=1) and variable.cuda(device_id=1).
This should be fixed and made consistent.

body:
As mentioned in https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/copying-a-variable-to-a-different-gpu/7237, there is a discrepancy between [`tensor.cuda(device=1)`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/_utils.py#L38) and [`variable.cuda(device_id=1)`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/variable.py#L279).
This should be fixed and made consistent.
